page.title: 18Attitudes survey results 2
page.content: The questions on the survey about place of birth of the children and their children produced these results. 50% of the parents of children who took part in the survey were born in this part of Cornwall.40% of the children were born here. The remaining children were born in Peru,Nottingham,Plymouth,London(3), Birmingham and Buckinghamshire. When asked what improvements could be made to this area the response was varied.50% said that the provision of recreational play space and sports facilities was important.The rest of the responses included;improve roads,improve the involvement of people in 'village life',conserve the existing countryside,improve planning regulations so that new buildings fit into the local environment and finally one said the weather could be improved
